25.ara-name: كتاب الأطعمة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdullah bin 'Amr: That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "(All of you) worship Ar-Rahman, feed others, spread the (greeting of) Salam, then you will enter Paradise in security." He said: This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ إِطْعَامِ الطَّعَامِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtues Of Feeding Others
